name: essence

essence noun
(IMPORTANCE)

C2 [ S or U ] the basic or most important idea or quality of something: The essence of his argument was that education should continue throughout life. Yet change is the very essence of life. in essence C2 formal
relating to the most important characteristics or ideas of something: In essence, both sides agree on the issue.
See more be of the essence formal
to be the most important thing: In any of these discussions, of course, honesty is of the essence.
